alert.note: Alert for Lower Treasure Valley; Owyhee Mountains; Upper Treasure Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 6:09PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Ada, southeastern Canyon and northwestern Owyhee Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 608 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Squaw Butte to near Silver City. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Reynolds around 620 PM MDT. Murphy, Givens Hot Springs and Walters Ferry around 640 PM MDT. Melba and Guffey around 650 PM MDT. Nampa and Lake Lowell around 700 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Lower Treasure Valley; Owyhee Mountains; Upper Treasure Valley
